Token.Abstract: Represents a conceptual "file" object in Virtuoso.
Returns the total device storage (in bytes) currently used by all downloaded Virtuoso files

ReturnValue.Abstract: The total device storage (in bytes) currently used by all downloaded Virtuoso files

Token.Abstract: Returns the amount of device storage (in bytes) still available for Virtuoso to use

ReturnValue.Abstract: The total disk space (in bytes) still available to Virtuoso for downloads

Token.Abstract: If set, this block is called whenever an asset is about to request data from a network resource.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A callback block used to retrieve additional URL parameters when downloading asset data.

Token.Abstract: Creates a new in-memory VirtuosoAsset object.
Token.Declaration: + (nullable VirtuosoAsset *)assetWithRemoteURL:(nonnull NSString *)assetURL assetID:(nonnull NSString *)assetID description:(nonnull NSString *)description publishDate:(nullable NSDate *)publishDate expiryDate:(nullable NSDate *)expiryDate enableFastPlay:(Boolean)enableFastPlay userInfo:(nullable NSDictionary *)userInfo onReadyForDownload:(nullable AssetReadyForDownloadBlock)readyBlock onParseComplete:(nullable AssetParsingCompletedBlock)completeBlock

Parameter.Name: assetURL
Parameter.Abstract: The remote URL for the file (where to download from).

Parameter.Name: assetID
Parameter.Abstract: A unique identifier for the asset. Used in all log events.

Parameter.Name: description
Parameter.Abstract: A description of the asset. Virtuoso only uses this in log output.

Parameter.Name: publishDate
Parameter.Abstract: Virtuoso will not provide API access to the asset until this date. Nil means "now."

Parameter.Name: expiryDate
Parameter.Abstract: Virtuoso will not provide API access to the asset after this date. Nil means no expiry.

Parameter.Name: enableFastPlay
Parameter.Abstract: If enabled, Virtuoso will automatically download the initial portion of the asset as soon as the asset is created. Whenever an asset is streamed, the cached beginning of the asset will be returned to the player immediatley, eliminating startup buffer time for streamed playback.

Parameter.Name: userInfo
Parameter.Abstract: A convenience field allowing you to associate arbitrary data with an asset. Virtuoso will serialize this data and store it, but not explicitly use this data. The provided userInfo must be property-list compatible. May be nil.

Parameter.Name: readyBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Called when the asset is ready to be added to the download queue

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Called when asset parsing completes. May be nil.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new VirtuosoAsset object, or nil if an error occurred.

Token.Abstract: Creates a new in-memory VirtuosoAsset object.
Token.Declaration: + (nullable VirtuosoAsset *)assetWithRemoteURL:(nonnull NSString *)assetURL assetID:(nonnull NSString *)assetID description:(nonnull NSString *)description publishDate:(nullable NSDate *)publishDate expiryDate:(nullable NSDate *)expiryDate expiryAfterDownload:(NSTimeInterval)expiryAfterDownload expiryAfterPlay:(NSTimeInterval)expiryAfterPlay enableFastPlay:(Boolean)enableFastPlay userInfo:(nullable NSDictionary *)userInfo onReadyForDownload:(nullable AssetReadyForDownloadBlock)readyBlock onParseComplete:(nullable AssetParsingCompletedBlock)completeBlock

Parameter.Name: assetURL
Parameter.Abstract: The remote URL for the file (where to download from).

Parameter.Name: assetID
Parameter.Abstract: A unique identifier for the asset. Used in all log events.

Parameter.Name: description
Parameter.Abstract: A description of the asset. Virtuoso only uses this in log output.

Parameter.Name: publishDate
Parameter.Abstract: Virtuoso will not provide API access to the asset until this date. Nil means "now."

Parameter.Name: expiryDate
Parameter.Abstract: Virtuoso will not provide API access to the asset after this date. Nil means no expiry.

Parameter.Name: expiryAfterDownload
Parameter.Abstract: Amount of time after Virtuoso completes download of asset that Virtuoso will delete the asset. In seconds. <=0.0 means no expiry.

Parameter.Name: expiryAfterPlay
Parameter.Abstract: Amount of time after the asset is first played that Virtuoso will delete the asset. In seconds. <=0.0 means no expiry.

Parameter.Name: enableFastPlay
Parameter.Abstract: If enabled, Virtuoso will automatically download the initial portion of the asset as soon as the asset is created. Whenever an asset is streamed, the cached beginning of the asset will be returned to the player immediatley, eliminating startup buffer time for streamed playback.

Parameter.Name: userInfo
Parameter.Abstract: A convenience field allowing you to associate arbitrary data with an asset. Virtuoso will serialize this data and store it, but not explicitly use this data. The provided userInfo must be property-list compatible. May be nil.

Parameter.Name: readyBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Called when the asset is ready to be added to the download queue

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Called when asset parsing completes. May be nil.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new VirtuosoAsset object, or nil if an error occurred.

Token.Abstract: Returns an array of all assets. This method only returns non-ad content.

Parameter.Name: availabilityFilter
Parameter.Abstract: Whether to filter the returned array against the availability window. If NO, then all VirtuosoAsset objects are returned. If YES, then Virtuoso filters out all assets that are unavailable, based on their publishDate and expiry constraints.

Token.Abstract: Returns an array of all pending (undownloaded) assets. This method only returns non-ad content.

Parameter.Name: availabilityFilter
Parameter.Abstract: Whether to filter the returned array against the availability window. If NO, then all VirtuosoAsset objects are returned. If YES, then Virtuoso filters out all assets that are unavailable, based on their publishDate and expiry constraints.

Token.Abstract: Returns an array of all completed (downloaded) assets. This method only returns non-ad content.

Parameter.Name: availabilityFilter
Parameter.Abstract: Whether to filter the returned array against the availability window. If NO, then all VirtuosoAsset objects are returned. If YES, then Virtuoso filters out all assets that are unavailable, based on their publishDate and expiry constraints.

Token.Abstract: Lookup an asset by UUID.

Parameter.Name: uuid
Parameter.Abstract: The UUID (universally unique identifier) corresponding to the asset

Parameter.Name: availabilityFilter
Parameter.Abstract: Whether to filter the return value against the availability window. If NO, then the asset will be returned if it exists. If YES, then Virtuoso will return nil for the asset if it is unavailable, based on its publishDate and expiry constraints.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An instantiated VirtuosoAsset object or nil, if the asset doesn't exist or is unavailable.

Token.Abstract: Lookup an asset by assetID.

Parameter.Name: assetID
Parameter.Abstract: The assetID corresponding to the asset

Parameter.Name: availabilityFilter
Parameter.Abstract: Whether to filter the return value against the availability window. If NO, then the asset will be returned if it exists. If YES, then Virtuoso will return nil for the asset if it is unavailable, based on its publishDate and expiry constraints.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An instantiated VirtuosoAsset object or nil, if the asset does not exist or is unavailable.

Token.Abstract: Refreshes the data in this object from the persistent data store
Persists the VirtuosoAsset object for later use
Synchronously deletes this asset
Asynchronously deletes this asset

Parameter.Name: deletedBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Notifies that Virtuoso has finished deleting all asset resources from disk.

Token.Abstract: Deletes all assets.
Plays this asset by presenting a standard MPMoviePlayerViewController from the specified parent view controller.
Token.Declaration: - (void)playUsingPlaybackType:(kVDE_AssetPlaybackType)playbackType fromViewController:(nonnull UIViewController *)parent onSuccess:(nullable BasicCompletionBlock)onSuccess onFail:(nullable BasicCompletionBlock)onFail

Parameter.Name: playbackType
Parameter.Abstract: Whether to play the downloaded copy or the online copy

Parameter.Name: parent
Parameter.Abstract: The parent view controller to present the movie player from

Parameter.Name: onSuccess
Parameter.Abstract: Called when playback succeeds

Parameter.Name: onFail
Parameter.Abstract: Called when playback fails

ReturnValue.Abstract: Returns NO if the playback cannot be set up for some reason

Token.Abstract: Plays this asset using a custom player class. You are responsible for presentation.
Token.Declaration: - (void)playUsingPlaybackType:(kVDE_AssetPlaybackType)playbackType andPlayer:(nonnull id<VirtuosoPlayer>)player onSuccess:(nullable BasicCompletionBlock)onSuccess onFail:(nullable BasicCompletionBlock)onFail

Parameter.Name: playbackType
Parameter.Abstract: Whether to play the downloaded copy or the online copy

Parameter.Name: player
Parameter.Abstract: An object that follows the VirtuosoPlayer protocol.

Parameter.Name: onSuccess
Parameter.Abstract: Called when playback succeeds

Parameter.Name: onFail
Parameter.Abstract: Called when playback fails

ReturnValue.Abstract: Returns NO if the playback cannot be set up for some reason

Token.Abstract: Called when playback finishes (the video player exits) to cleanup the session.

Clears this asset's internal retry count, so Virtuoso will retry downloading it

Parameter.Name: onComplete
Parameter.Abstract: A block to call when the engine has finished resetting the error count

Token.Abstract: Sets the inForcedExpire flag for this asset

Parameter.Name: expired
Parameter.Abstract: Whether this asset should be marked as inForcedExpire.

Token.Abstract: Sets this asset's availability window

Parameter.Abstract: When this asset should be made available for access (publishDate

Parameter.Name: end
Parameter.Abstract: When this asset should be made unavailable for access (expiryDate

Creates a new in-memory HSS VirtuosoAsset.
Token.Declaration: + (nullable VirtuosoAsset *)assetWithAssetID:(nonnull NSString *)assetID description:(nonnull NSString *)description manifestUrl:(nonnull NSString *)manifestUrl maximumVideoBitrate:(long long)maximumVideoBitrate maximumAudioBitrate:(long long)maximumAudioBitrate publishDate:(nullable NSDate *)publishDate expiryDate:(nullable NSDate *)expiryDate enableFastPlay:(Boolean)enableFastPlay userInfo:(nullable NSDictionary *)userInfo onReadyForDownload:(nullable AssetReadyForDownloadBlock)readyBlock onParseComplete:(nullable AssetParsingCompletedBlock)completeBlock

Parameter.Name: assetID
Parameter.Abstract: A unique identifier for the asset. Used in all log events.

Parameter.Name: description
Parameter.Abstract: A description of the asset. Virtuoso only uses this in log output.

Parameter.Name: manifestUrl
Parameter.Abstract: Where the manifest lives on the Internet.

Parameter.Name: maximumVideoBitrate
Parameter.Abstract: For manifests containing multiple profiles, Virtuoso will select the highest bitrate profile whose bitrate doesn't exceed this value. A value of 1 means "use the lowest bitrate." If there's no profile of lower bitrate than maximumBitrate, Virtuoso will select the lowest bitrate profile. A value of INT_MAX means "use the highest bitrate."

Parameter.Name: maximumAudioBitrate
Parameter.Abstract: Same as maximumVideoBitrate, but for the audio portion of the stream.

Parameter.Name: publishDate
Parameter.Abstract: Virtuoso will not provide API access to the asset until this date. Nil means "now."

Parameter.Name: expiryDate
Parameter.Abstract: Virtuoso will not provide API access to the asset after this date. Nil means no expiry.

Parameter.Name: enableFastPlay
Parameter.Abstract: If enabled, Virtuoso will automatically download the initial portion of the asset as soon as the asset is created. Whenever an asset is streamed, the cached beginning of the asset will be returned to the player immediatley, eliminating startup buffer time for streamed playback.

Parameter.Name: userInfo
Parameter.Abstract: A convenience field allowing you to associate arbitrary data with an asset. Virtuoso will serialize this data and store it, but not explicitly use this data. The provided userInfo must be property-list compatible. May be nil.

Parameter.Name: readyBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Called when the asset is ready to be added to the download queue

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Called when asset parsing completes. May be nil.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new (empty) VirtuosoAsset object, or nil if there was an error.

Token.Abstract: Creates a new empty HSS VirtuosoAsset object, identified by the provided manifest URL.
Token.Declaration: + (nullable VirtuosoAsset *)assetWithAssetID:(nonnull NSString *)assetID description:(nonnull NSString *)description manifestUrl:(nonnull NSString *)manifestUrl maximumVideoBitrate:(long long)maximumVideoBitrate maximumAudioBitrate:(long long)maximumAudioBitrate publishDate:(nullable NSDate *)publishDate expiryDate:(nullable NSDate *)expiryDate expiryAfterDownload:(NSTimeInterval)expiryAfterDownload expiryAfterPlay:(NSTimeInterval)expiryAfterPlay enableFastPlay:(Boolean)enableFastPlay userInfo:(nullable NSDictionary *)userInfo onReadyForDownload:(nullable AssetReadyForDownloadBlock)readyBlock onParseComplete:(nullable AssetParsingCompletedBlock)completeBlock

Parameter.Name: assetID
Parameter.Abstract: A unique identifier for the asset. Used in all log events.

Parameter.Name: description
Parameter.Abstract: A description of the asset. Virtuoso only uses this in log output.

Parameter.Name: manifestUrl
Parameter.Abstract: Where the manifest lives on the Internet.

Parameter.Name: maximumVideoBitrate
Parameter.Abstract: For manifests containing multiple profiles, Virtuoso will select the highest bitrate profile whose bitrate doesn't exceed this value. A value of 1 means "use the lowest bitrate." If there's no profile of lower bitrate than maximumBitrate, Virtuoso will select the lowest bitrate profile. A value of INT_MAX means "use the highest bitrate."

Parameter.Name: maximumAudioBitrate
Parameter.Abstract: Same as maximumVideoBitrate, but for the audio portion of the stream.

Parameter.Name: publishDate
Parameter.Abstract: Virtuoso will not provide API access to the asset until this date. Nil means "now."

Parameter.Name: expiryDate
Parameter.Abstract: Virtuoso will not provide API access to the asset after this date. Nil means no expiry.

Parameter.Name: expiryAfterDownload
Parameter.Abstract: Amount of time after Virtuoso completes download of file that Virtuoso will delete the file. In seconds. <=0 means no expiry.

Parameter.Name: expiryAfterPlay
Parameter.Abstract: Amount of time after the asset is first played that Virtuoso will delete the asset. In seconds. <=0 means no expiry.

Parameter.Name: enableFastPlay
Parameter.Abstract: If enabled, Virtuoso will automatically download the initial portion of the asset as soon as the asset is created. Whenever an asset is streamed, the cached beginning of the asset will be returned to the player immediatley, eliminating startup buffer time for streamed playback.

Parameter.Name: userInfo
Parameter.Abstract: A convenience field allowing you to associate arbitrary data with an asset. Virtuoso will serialize this data and store it, but not explicitly use this data. The provided userInfo must be property-list compatible. May be nil.

Parameter.Name: readyBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Called when the asset is ready to be added to the download queue

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Called when asset parsing completes. May be nil.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new (empty) VirtuosoAsset object, or nil if there was an error.

Token.Abstract: Adds a manifest URL to an existing VirtuosoAsset.

Parameter.Name: manifestUrl
Parameter.Abstract: Where the manifest lives on the Internet.

Parameter.Name: maximumVideoBitrate
Parameter.Abstract: For manifests containing multiple profiles, Virtuoso will select the highest bitrate profile whose bitrate doesn't exceed this value. A value of 1 means "use the lowest bitrate." If there's no profile of lower bitrate than maximumBitrate, Virtuoso will select the lowest bitrate profile. A value of INT_MAX means "use the highest bitrate."

Parameter.Name: maximumAudioBitrate
Parameter.Abstract: Same as maximumVideoBitrate, but for the audio portion of the stream.

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Called when asset parsing completes. May be nil.

Token.Abstract: Creates a new in-memory HLS VirtuosoAsset.
Token.Declaration: + (nullable VirtuosoAsset *)assetWithAssetID:(nonnull NSString *)assetID description:(nonnull NSString *)description manifestUrl:(nonnull NSString *)manifestUrl protectionType:(kVDE_AssetProtectionType)protectionType includeEncryptionKeys:(Boolean)includeEncryption maximumBitrate:(long long)maximumBitrate publishDate:(nullable NSDate *)publishDate expiryDate:(nullable NSDate *)expiryDate enableFastPlay:(Boolean)enableFastPlay userInfo:(nullable NSDictionary *)userInfo onReadyForDownload:(nullable AssetReadyForDownloadBlock)readyBlock onParseComplete:(nullable AssetParsingCompletedBlock)completeBlock

Parameter.Name: assetID
Parameter.Abstract: A unique identifier for the asset. Used in all log events.

Parameter.Name: description
Parameter.Abstract: A description of the asset. Virtuoso only uses this in log output.

Parameter.Name: manifestUrl
Parameter.Abstract: Where the manifest lives on the Internet.

Parameter.Name: protectionType
Parameter.Abstract: You should pass the default value of kVDE_AssetProtectionTypePassthrough unless instructed differently by Penthera support.

Parameter.Name: includeEncryption
Parameter.Abstract: If YES, then this method will download any encryption keys in manifest. Normally, you would pass YES, but this allows for custom behaviors.

Parameter.Name: maximumBitrate
Parameter.Abstract: For manifests containing multiple profiles, Virtuoso will select the highest bitrate profile whose bitrate doesn't exceed this value. A value of 1 means "use the lowest bitrate." If there's no profile of lower bitrate than maximumBitrate, Virtuoso will select the lowest bitrate profile. A value of INT_MAX means "use the highest bitrate."

Parameter.Name: publishDate
Parameter.Abstract: Virtuoso will not provide API access to the asset until this date. Nil means "now."

Parameter.Name: expiryDate
Parameter.Abstract: Virtuoso will not provide API access to the asset after this date. Nil means no expiry.

Parameter.Name: enableFastPlay
Parameter.Abstract: If enabled, Virtuoso will automatically download the initial portion of the asset as soon as the asset is created. Whenever an asset is streamed, the cached beginning of the asset will be returned to the player immediatley, eliminating startup buffer time for streamed playback.

Parameter.Name: userInfo
Parameter.Abstract: A convenience field allowing you to associate arbitrary data with an asset. Virtuoso will serialize this data and store it, but not explicitly use this data. The provided userInfo must be property-list compatible. May be nil.

Parameter.Name: readyBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Called when the asset is ready to be added to the download queue

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Called when asset parsing completes. May be nil.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new (empty) VirtuosoAsset object, or nil if there was an error.

Token.Abstract: Creates a new in-memory HLS VirtuosoAsset object.
Token.Declaration: + (nullable VirtuosoAsset *)assetWithAssetID:(nonnull NSString *)assetID description:(nonnull NSString *)description manifestUrl:(nonnull NSString *)manifestUrl protectionType:(kVDE_AssetProtectionType)protectionType includeEncryptionKeys:(Boolean)includeEncryption maximumBitrate:(long long)maximumBitrate publishDate:(nullable NSDate *)publishDate expiryDate:(nullable NSDate *)expiryDate expiryAfterDownload:(NSTimeInterval)expiryAfterDownload expiryAfterPlay:(NSTimeInterval)expiryAfterPlay enableFastPlay:(Boolean)enableFastPlay userInfo:(nullable NSDictionary *)userInfo onReadyForDownload:(nullable AssetReadyForDownloadBlock)readyBlock onParseComplete:(nullable AssetParsingCompletedBlock)completeBlock

Parameter.Name: assetID
Parameter.Abstract: A unique identifier for the asset. Used in all log events.

Parameter.Name: description
Parameter.Abstract: A description of the asset. Virtuoso only uses this in log output.

Parameter.Name: manifestUrl
Parameter.Abstract: Where the manifest lives on the Internet.

Parameter.Name: protectionType
Parameter.Abstract: You should pass the default value of kVDE_AssetProtectionTypePassthrough unless instructed differently by Penthera support.

Parameter.Name: includeEncryption
Parameter.Abstract: If YES, then this method will download any encryption keys in manifest. Normally, you would pass YES, but this allows for custom behaviors.

Parameter.Name: maximumBitrate
Parameter.Abstract: For manifests containing multiple profiles, Virtuoso will select the highest bitrate profile whose bitrate doesn't exceed this value. A value of 1 means "use the lowest bitrate." If there's no profile of lower bitrate than maximumBitrate, Virtuoso will select the lowest bitrate profile. A value of INT_MAX means "use the highest bitrate."

Parameter.Name: publishDate
Parameter.Abstract: Virtuoso will not provide API access to the asset until this date. Nil means "now."

Parameter.Name: expiryDate
Parameter.Abstract: Virtuoso will not provide API access to the asset after this date. Nil means no expiry.

Parameter.Name: expiryAfterDownload
Parameter.Abstract: Amount of time after Virtuoso completes download of the asset that Virtuoso will delete the asset. In seconds. <=0 means no expiry.

Parameter.Name: expiryAfterPlay
Parameter.Abstract: Amount of time after the asset is first played that Virtuoso will delete the asset. In seconds. <=0 means no expiry.

Parameter.Name: enableFastPlay
Parameter.Abstract: If enabled, Virtuoso will automatically download the initial portion of the asset as soon as the asset is created. Whenever an asset is streamed, the cached beginning of the asset will be returned to the player immediatley, eliminating startup buffer time for streamed playback.

Parameter.Name: userInfo
Parameter.Abstract: A convenience field allowing you to associate arbitrary data with an asset. Virtuoso will serialize this data and store it, but not explicitly use this data. The provided userInfo must be property-list compatible. May be nil.

Parameter.Name: readyBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Called when the asset is ready to be added to the download queue

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Called when asset parsing completes. May be nil.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new (empty) VirtuosoAsset object, or nil if there was an error.

Token.Abstract: Adds a manifest URL to this VirtuosoAsset. Call does nothing if the VirtuosoAsset is not an HLS asset.

Parameter.Name: manifestUrl
Parameter.Abstract: Where the manifest lives on the Internet.

Parameter.Name: includeEncryption
Parameter.Abstract: If YES, then this method will download any encryption keys in manifest. Normally, you would pass YES, but this allows for custom behaviors.

Parameter.Name: maximumBitrate
Parameter.Abstract: For manifests containing multiple profiles, Virtuoso will select the highest bitrate profile whose bitrate doesn't exceed this value. A value of 1 means "use the lowest bitrate." If there's no profile of lower bitrate than maximumBitrate, Virtuoso will select the lowest bitrate profile. A value of INT_MAX means "use the highest bitrate."

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Called when asset parsing completes. May be nil.

Token.Abstract: Returns the local file path for the HLS manifest of the given type and subtype

Parameter.Name: type
Parameter.Abstract: The HLS manifest type to return

Parameter.Name: subtype
Parameter.Abstract: The subtype of the manifest to return

ReturnValue.Abstract: The local file path for the HLS manifest of the given type and subtype

Token.Abstract: The local file path for the saved FastPlay manifest file
Creates a new in-memory DASH VirtuosoAsset.
Token.Declaration: + (nullable VirtuosoAsset *)assetWithAssetID:(nonnull NSString *)assetID description:(nonnull NSString *)description mpdUrl:(nonnull NSString *)mpdUrl protectionType:(kVDE_AssetProtectionType)protectionType maximumVideoBitrate:(long long)maximumVideoBitrate maximumAudioBitrate:(long long)maximumAudioBitrate publishDate:(nullable NSDate *)publishDate expiryDate:(nullable NSDate *)expiryDate enableFastPlay:(Boolean)enableFastPlay userInfo:(nullable NSDictionary *)userInfo onReadyForDownload:(nullable AssetReadyForDownloadBlock)readyBlock onParseComplete:(nullable AssetParsingCompletedBlock)completeBlock

Parameter.Name: assetID
Parameter.Abstract: A unique identifier for the asset. Used in all log events.

Parameter.Name: description
Parameter.Abstract: A description of the asset. Virtuoso only uses this in log output.

Parameter.Name: mpdUrl
Parameter.Abstract: Where the media presentation description (mpd) file lives on the Internet.

Parameter.Name: protectionType
Parameter.Abstract: You should pass the default value of kVDE_AssetProtectionTypePassthrough unless instructed differently by Penthera support.

Parameter.Name: maximumVideoBitrate
Parameter.Abstract: For mpd files containing multiple profiles, Virtuoso will select the highest bitrate profile whose bitrate doesn't exceed this value. A value of 1 means "use the lowest bitrate." If there's no profile of lower bitrate than maximumBitrate, Virtuoso will select the lowest bitrate profile. A value of INT_MAX means "use the highest bitrate."

Parameter.Name: maximumAudioBitrate
Parameter.Abstract: Same as maximumVideoBitrate, but for the audio portion of the stream. If the audio for this asset is contained within the video profile, this value is ignored.

Parameter.Name: publishDate
Parameter.Abstract: Virtuoso will not provide API access to the asset until this date. Nil means "now."

Parameter.Name: expiryDate
Parameter.Abstract: Virtuoso will not provide API access to the asset after this date. Nil means no expiry.

Parameter.Name: enableFastPlay
Parameter.Abstract: If enabled, Virtuoso will automatically download the initial portion of the asset as soon as the asset is created. Whenever an asset is streamed, the cached beginning of the asset will be returned to the player immediatley, eliminating startup buffer time for streamed playback.

Parameter.Name: userInfo
Parameter.Abstract: A convenience field allowing you to associate arbitrary data with an asset. Virtuoso will serialize this data and store it, but not explicitly use this data. The provided userInfo must be property-list compatible. May be nil.

Parameter.Name: readyBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Called when the asset is ready to be added to the download queue

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Called when asset parsing completes. May be nil.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new (empty) VirtuosoAsset object, or nil if an error occured.

Token.Abstract: Creates a new in-memory DASH VirtuosoAsset object.
Token.Declaration: + (nullable VirtuosoAsset *)assetWithAssetID:(nonnull NSString *)assetID description:(nonnull NSString *)description mpdUrl:(nonnull NSString *)mpdUrl protectionType:(kVDE_AssetProtectionType)protectionType maximumVideoBitrate:(long long)maximumVideoBitrate maximumAudioBitrate:(long long)maximumAudioBitrate publishDate:(nullable NSDate *)publishDate expiryDate:(nullable NSDate *)expiryDate expiryAfterDownload:(NSTimeInterval)expiryAfterDownload expiryAfterPlay:(NSTimeInterval)expiryAfterPlay enableFastPlay:(Boolean)enableFastPlay userInfo:(nullable NSDictionary *)userInfo onReadyForDownload:(nullable AssetReadyForDownloadBlock)readyBlock onParseComplete:(nullable AssetParsingCompletedBlock)completeBlock

Parameter.Name: assetID
Parameter.Abstract: A unique identifier for the asset. Used in all log events.

Parameter.Name: description
Parameter.Abstract: A description of the asset. Virtuoso only uses this in log output.

Parameter.Name: mpdUrl
Parameter.Abstract: Where the media presentation description (mpd) file lives on the Internet.

Parameter.Name: protectionType
Parameter.Abstract: You should pass the default value of kVDE_AssetProtectionTypePassthrough unless instructed differently by Penthera support.

Parameter.Name: maximumVideoBitrate
Parameter.Abstract: For mpd files containing multiple profiles, Virtuoso will select the highest bitrate profile whose bitrate doesn't exceed this value. A value of 1 means "use the lowest bitrate." If there's no profile of lower bitrate than maximumBitrate, Virtuoso will select the lowest bitrate profile. A value of INT_MAX means "use the highest bitrate."

Parameter.Name: maximumAudioBitrate
Parameter.Abstract: Same as maximumVideoBitrate, but for the audio portion of the stream. If the audio for this asset is contained within the video profile, this value is ignored.

Parameter.Name: publishDate
Parameter.Abstract: Virtuoso will not provide API access to the asset until this date. Nil means "now."

Parameter.Name: expiryDate
Parameter.Abstract: Virtuoso will not provide API access to the asset after this date. Nil means no expiry.

Parameter.Name: expiryAfterDownload
Parameter.Abstract: Amount of time after Virtuoso completes download of the asset that Virtuoso will delete the asset. In seconds. <=0 means no expiry.

Parameter.Name: expiryAfterPlay
Parameter.Abstract: Amount of time after the asset is first played that Virtuoso will delete the asset. In seconds. <=0 means no expiry.

Parameter.Name: enableFastPlay
Parameter.Abstract: If enabled, Virtuoso will automatically download the initial portion of the asset as soon as the asset is created. Whenever an asset is streamed, the cached beginning of the asset will be returned to the player immediatley, eliminating startup buffer time for streamed playback.

Parameter.Name: userInfo
Parameter.Abstract: A convenience field allowing you to associate arbitrary data with an asset. Virtuoso will serialize this data and store it, but not explicitly use this data. The provided userInfo must be property-list compatible. May be nil.

Parameter.Name: readyBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Called when the asset is ready to be added to the download queue

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Called when asset parsing completes. May be nil.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new (empty) VirtuosoAsset object, or nil if an error occured.

Token.Abstract: Adds a mpd URL to this VirtuosoAsset. Call does nothing if the VirtuosoAsset is not a DASH asset.
Token.Declaration: - (void)setMpdURL:(nonnull NSString *)mpdUrl withMaximumVideoBitrate:(long long)maximumVideoBitrate andMaximumAudioBitrate:(long long)maximumAudioBitrate onParseComplete:(nullable AssetParsingCompletedBlock)completeBlock

Parameter.Name: mpdUrl
Parameter.Abstract: Where the media presentation description (mpd) lives on the Internet.

Parameter.Name: maximumVideoBitrate
Parameter.Abstract: For mpd files containing multiple profiles, Virtuoso will select the highest bitrate profile whose bitrate doesn't exceed this value. A value of 1 means "use the lowest bitrate." If there's no profile of lower bitrate than maximumBitrate, Virtuoso will select the lowest bitrate profile. A value of INT_MAX means "use the highest bitrate."

Parameter.Name: maximumAudioBitrate
Parameter.Abstract: Same as maximumVideoBitrate, but for the audio portion of the stream. If the audio for this asset is contained within the video profile, this value is ignored.

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Called when asset parsing completes. May be nil.
